title: Best of The Herd: 11/29/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 11/29/2019
description:
Filling in for Colin, Doug Gottlieb breaks down the Dallas Cowboys issues, Jerry Jones' thoughts on HC Jason Garrett, what the Saints should consider going forward, and Kyrie Irving's latest comments and why he's hard to deal with.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
